title: SunShine Day Blackout Curtains 72Inches Long, Hand Drawn Sketch Ballerina Girl Panel Door Curtains Soft Window Treatment for Bedroom/Living Room Pink White 52'' x 72''
features: [COZY ENVIROMENT]- It can provide you with a real dark environment, very suitable for baby rooms and night shift workers. It is absolutely private for all your indoor activities.
[DURABLE FABRIC]- This thermal insulated drapes is made of high quality and eco-friendly polyester fabric.
[CLEAN ATTENTION]- Room darkening curtains. Machine washable or hand, with cold water, in a gentle cycle, do not bleach, the drum is low to dry.
[EASY AND CONVENIENT TO HANG]- This soft and smooth grommets drapes panel with 8 grommets, you only need to put the curtain on your pole through this grommet.
[MULTY SIZE]- When you buy the window covering, it is recommended to choose a window larger than your own with the size of 52''W x 72''L.
description: Save energy budget. This thermal insulation curtain reduces your heating and cooling costs by preventing sunlight and airflow from entering. Balance room temperature, heat insulation in summer and warm in winter to protect furniture and electrical appliances from sunlight.Provide the best sleep and the most comfortable environment for bedridden and those who have difficulty falling asleep.Decorate your windows in your home, business office, kitchen, bedroom, farmhouses, patio, apartment and other places, suitable for modern, traditional, retro and rustic home style.
